question: I would like to know if shaving the head bald is against the sunnah
answer:
QUESTION
I would like to know if shaving the head bald is against the sunnah. This is not regarding after hajj, but just as a normal haircut?

ANSWER


Share:

It is not against the Sunnah to remove all the hair of the head. This was the normal practice and habit of Hadhrat Ali [radhiallaahu anhum].

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
